title: Black Holes
description: A video about the black hole and what is in there. A great way to entertain yourself as well as educate yourself
author: Nat Geo

title: Power of Cheetahs
description: The animals cheetahs are almost greatly underrated but this video is out to prove that we are gravely wrong to be doing that because they can do some pf the greatest things.
author: Nat Geo

title: How to build a great company
description: This video teaches about how to build a business from scratch and have it be sucessful.It is simple but comprehensive way to learn.
author: Vusi Thembekwayo

title: Improve your Critical Thinking
description: This is a video about wht you can do to improve your critical thinking. It is a walk through on what you can do to improve your critical thinking.
author: Ted-Ed

title: How You Can Achieve Anything
description: This is a video about how to achieve the things we believe are hard to do. It offers great motivation to people who feel lost.
author: Great Achiever

title: Empty Your Mind
description: This teaches about how to achieve piece of mind in the midst of a storm. This is a very useful resource for those struggling to achieve quiet.
author: Author 1

title: A single Step
description: A great video about how to take life step by step as the challenges arise. It helps us relax when all the things in life are falling part.
author: Great Achiever

title: Three Laughing Monks
description: A fictional story about three monks who are having a lot of fun with the current life they live.
author: Author 1

title: The Complete Backend Development Journey
description: This video gives you an overview of what you are expected to do if you want to be a backend developer. It shows you the tips and tricks you need to know.
author: John Mosh

title: Mobile Developer Roadmap
description: This video gives you an overview of what you are expected to do if you want to be a mobile developer. It shows you the tips and tricks you need to know.
author: John Mosh

title: ChatGPT Prompting
description: This is a video that gives you an overview of how to prompt an LLM for the perfect response. It is very edifying and eye opening about LLM prompting.
author: Chen Wang

title: Installing Next.js
description: A video that teaches briefly about how to install next.js on your computer with ease and also briefly how to use the software.
author: John Mosh

title: A Powerful Message
description: This is a short but precise  message about how life can be tough but everyone needs to keep moving on. It is a great motivational speech for anyone.
author: Vusi Thembekwayo

title: Material 2
description: A summary of about 20 to 30 words of the particular item
author: Author 2
